mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sutda_comment (`no`, `order`, board_no, player_no, content, regdate) VALUES ((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(no)+1, 0) FROM sutda_comment c), 0, #{boardNo}, #{player.no}, #{content},date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'))

INSERT INTO sutda_comment (`no`, `order`, board_no, player_no, content, regdate) VALUES( #{no}, (SELECT `order` FROM (SELECT MAX(`order`)+1 as `order` FROM sutda_comment WHERE no = #{no}) as `order`), (SELECT board_no FROM (SELECT board_no FROM sutda_comment WHERE no=#{no} AND `order`=0) as board_no), #{player.no}, #{content}, date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'))
mapper.select: SELECT c.no no, `order` orderNo, board_no boardNo, content, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, c.regdate, NOW()) regdate, p.no 'player.no', IFNULL(p.nickname ,'탈퇴한 사용자') 'player.nickname', IF(${myComment}=player_no,1,0) as myComment FROM sutda_comment c LEFT JOIN player p ON player_no = p.no WHERE c.no = #{no} AND `order` != 0 ORDER BY regdate desc LIMIT #{page.startContent}, #{page.contentCount}
